channel.title: Connect...disconnect
channel.description: Ok, I've got my server running and for no reson at all (I think) my server keeps kicking or disconnecting eveyone right when they log in. Any suggestions?

item.title: Connect...disconnect
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

Show me this.

Read full topic

item.title: Connect...disconnect
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

imsuperman05:

Looks like your massSave is set for every 20 seconds. That could be causing it.

Now that you have identified the most likely cause of this problem, can you help him fix the problem?
(Not saying your help so far isn’t appreciated but I think you may be of further use to him than you realise)

Read full topic

Looks like your massSave is set for every 20 seconds. That could be causing it.

item.title: Connect...disconnect
item.dc:creator: @Devinhdl Devinhdl
item.description:
@Devinhdl wrote:

Here’s this,

and if you can’t see it, here’s this.

[7/23/11 12:35 AM]: Saved game for Wise Old Man. [7/23/11 12:36 AM]: Game saved for player Wise Old [7/23/11 12:36 AM]: [DEREGISTERED]: Wise Old Man

and kidpaparoach, it might be wireless ill try to use an ethernet cord.

Read full topic

item.title: Connect...disconnect
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

I’m not trying to be smart with you, sorry if it seemed that way :(.

That looks all fine to me… personally. It could be a client sided problem, bad internet, a OS problem or the auto restarter gone crazy. Sorry I can’t help with the provided information :(.
If your using a wireless rather than a Ethernet cable that may be why.

Read full topic

item.title: Connect...disconnect
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

[quote=“Devinhdl, post:7, topic:405857”]Don’t get smart with me, you can’t even word a sentence right (just missing word word, I do it all the time… I’m not argueing lol)

Devin, pay attention to what the user trying to you was saying to you.

But now that you pointed it out, I see what he was asking, thanks…

When the players get disconnected, it says [quote][7/23/11 12:29 AM]: [DEREGISTERED]: Wise Old Man[/quote] and it says that everytime someone logs out.[/quote]
Show me the whole run cmd, that’s suppose to show up when they logout.

Read full topic
